tool_description: Search, find random gems, explore the Word of the Day, and enjoy quotes, word associations, and games. Perfect for writers, developers, and language lovers—your gateway to linguistic wonders in a single click!
name: Words API
title: Words API

api_list.name: Game Normal
api_list.description: return a contexto game base on the id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://words-api5.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/dict/word/game-normal/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "words-api5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://words-api5.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/dict/word/game-normal/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "words-api5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Word Nearest Meaning
api_list.description: return a set of words that closely match the meaning of the word you provided
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://words-api5.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/dict/word-nearest-meaning/help"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "words-api5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://words-api5.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/dict/word-nearest-meaning/{word}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "words-api5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Quotes
